com.oose2015.cwang107.hareandhounds

Class GameService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.oose2015.cwang107.hareandhounds.GameService

  • public class GameService
extends java.lang.Object
    GameService is a class which provides service for the game running. It is initialized when the server starts. All boards info is stored here. This is a Model.
    Author:
    chenwang

                 GameService.GameServiceMoveException
        Move, all conditions check should be here. Note that this X Y is the opposite compare the array index. This method directly change the board, so there is no return.
        Parameters:
        gameId - A string game Id, then the system can identify the correct board and state info
        body - a String contains all other info about this move: playerId: , fromX: , fromY: , toX: , toY:
        Throws:
